nav.div: Bristol Public Schools » Information » Continuation of Learning Parent Communications » Coronavirus Information Links

div.span:
Please use the following websites for the most current information:
CDC: https://www.cdc.gov/coronavirus/2019-ncov/summary.html
DPH: https://portal.ct.gov/DPH/Public-Health-Preparedness/Main-Page/2019-Novel-Coronavirus
Both of these websites can also be accessed through the Connecticut State Department of Education home page banner at: https://portal.ct.gov/sde
